name: HTML Card Auto Battler
description:
All images belong to BLIZZARD ENTERTAINMENT,  game made for educational purpose only. 

More about Auto battler genre you can read here.

How to play:

  1.  Each player in turn selects given amount of cards and put them in battlefield.
  2. Drag and drop cards to move them.
  3. After second player turn, both sides can enter battle mode by pressing "Battle"  button.
  4. Battle is automatic,  after battle is over, all remaining alive cards can attack player health.
  5. Cards that survive battle can fight again in next round.
  6. Maximum number of cards in each battlefield is 6. Any unused cards in hand will be removed.
  7. Player that can reduce another player total HP to 0 wins.

Special abilities:

  • Shield  -  can survive one attack with out losing HP.
  • Taunt  - enemy cards attack taunt cards first.
  • Effect on Death  - after card reaches 0 HP it will do something.
